#include<stdio.h>
void Qsort (int C[], int beg, int endi)
{
    int low=beg, high=endi;
    int pivot_value;
    pivot_value=C[(beg+endi)/2];
    do
    {
        while (C[low]<pivot_value)
            low++;
        while (C[high]>pivot_value)
            high--;
        if (low<=high)
        {
            int temp=C[low];
            C[low++]=C[high];
            C[high--]=temp;
        }
    }while (low<=high);
 
    if (beg<high)
        Qsort(C,beg,high);
    if (low<endi)
        Qsort(C, low, endi);
}
 
int main()
{
    int T, N, i, val;
    scanf("%d", &N);
    int A[N];
    for (i=0; i<N; i++)
        scanf("%d", &A[i]);
    Qsort(A, 0, N-1);
    if (N%2==0)
        val=N/2;
    else
        val=(N+1)/2;
    printf("%d\n", A[val-1]);
 
    return 0;
}
